name: Create reaction for a team discussion

params.name: content
params.description: The [reaction type](https://developer.github.com/v3/reactions/#reaction-types) to add to the team discussion.

description: Create a reaction to a [team discussion](https://developer.github.com/v3/teams/discussions/). OAuth access tokens require the `write:discussion` [scope](https://developer.github.com/apps/building-oauth-apps/scopes-for-oauth-apps/). A response with a `Status: 200 OK` means that you already added the reaction type to this team discussion.
